channel.description: Saving the world one studio at a time

item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
dbyll is minimalist, stylish theme for jekyll. Supports gravatar, account links (github, twitter, e-mail, pinterest, r√©sume file) and a bio.

dbyll is brought to you by dbtek. Open sourced under MIT license.

This is a block quote

### dbyll is on GitHub

Grab your copy now!

item.title: Configuration
item.description:
In your config file change these settings

title: dbyll
author:  
  name: yourname  
  email: youremail  
  github: asd123  
  twitter: asd123  
  pinterest: asd123  
  linkedin: asd123  
  resume: asd123  
  bio: Your stylish,  minimalist theme!  
  email_md5: md5ofemail
